#{sfys,jdbcType=CHAR}, TQXT = #{tqxt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MSG_STATUS_ZFW = #{msgStatusZfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MSG_STATUS_GA = #{msgStatusGa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THSJ = #{thsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SASJ = #{sasj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SFFGQY = #{sffgqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBRNAME = #{cbrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBRID = #{cbrid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SARNAME = #{sarname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FARNAME = #{farname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FASJ = #{fasj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, YQSHRID = #{yqshrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YQSHRNAME = #{yqshrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFYQ = #{sfyq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHRID = #{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHRNAME = #{shrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHJG = #{shjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHBZ = #{shbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFBJ = #{sfbj,jdbcType=CHAR}, BJSJ = #{bjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JCYYSRID = #{jcyysrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JCYYSRXM = #{jcyysrxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JCYYSSJ = #{jcyyssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SBQXDM = #{sbqxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FTFD = #{ftfd,jdbcType=CHAR}, MSG_STATUS_FTFD = #{msgStatusFtfd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDUSERID = #{adduserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_AJZT = #{delAjzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELUSERID = #{deluserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTR1 = #{attr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTR2 = #{attr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTR3 = #{attr3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JASJ = #{jasj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OLDAJBS = #{oldajbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YWBH = #{ywbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YQRQ = #{yqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where AJBS = #{ajbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.ajbs,a.glbh,a.ajbh,a.ajlx,a.tqdwmc,a.tqdwdm,a.yssj,a.fssj,a.nm090d5cb6c0dfae21,a.nm5053fd8bd598dd8c,a. nm594ab7c3bdfd644b,a.tqaydm,a.sfcbaj,a.sfrzqa,a.xyrsfwcnr,a.bhrsfwcnr,a.xyrsftwr,a.bhrsftwr,a. slrq,a.sdsj,a.pages,a.msg_id,a.msg_status_jcy,a.msg_status_fy,a.msg_op,a.issh,a.addtime,a. shry,a.shsj,a.area_code,a.gacbr,a.gaysdw,a.area_code_ga,a.ishandadd,a.msg_date,a.settime,al.mc ajlb, a.badwid,a.badwmc,a.sfrj,a.rjsj,a.newdzjz,a.sfzwfzaj,a.sflajdaj,a.sfjdxzjgysaj, a.gtfzrs,a.sfdbaj,a.sfgzaj,a.sfzxhd,a.zxhdmc,a.aqzy,a.fuzhu,a.ysrjdh,a. zxhd,a.ysyj,a.sfswaj,a.sfdwfz,a.sfstaj,a.sfzdzrsgsszwfzaj,a.zwfzajsaly,a.zwfzajsaqtly,a.jrzcrq,a. tqjrlb,a.tqjrfs,a.ztfzxyrxmhzch,a.ztxyrrs,a.tipflag,a.ajmc,a.ah,a.sfys,a.tqxt,a.msg_status_zfw,a. msg_status_ga,a.thsj,a.sasj,a.sffgqy,a.cbrname,a.cbrid,a.sarname,a.farname,a.fasj,a.yqshrid,a. yqshrname,a.sfyq,a.shrid,a.shrname,a.shjg,a.shbz,a.sfbj,a.bjsj,a.jcyysrid,a.jcyysrxm,a.jcyyssj,a. sbqxdm,a.ftfd,a.msg_status_ftfd,a.adduserid,a.del_ajzt,a.deluserid,a.attr1,a.attr2,a.attr3,a. jasj,a.oldajbs,a.ywbh,a.yqrq,da.mc ajzt,ad1.fldmmc tqay,ad2.fldmmc ysqtay,ad3.fldmmc ysajdxzjglb, ad4.fldmmc gtfzxz from gj_ajjbqk a left join dict_ga da on a.ajzt=da.code left join aj_ajlb al on a.ajlb=al.bh left join aj_dictionary ad1 on ad1.fldm=a.tqaydm left join aj_dictionary ad2 on ad2.fldm=a.ysqtay left join aj_dictionary ad3 on ad3.fldm=a.ysajdxzjglb left join aj_dictionary ad4 on ad4.fldm=a.gtfzxz where da.dict_sm_id=5 and a.AJBS =#{ajbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.AJBS,a.AJBH,b.AJMC,DATE_FORMAT(b.LASJ,'%Y-%m-%d %T') LASJ,b.ZBDWMC,e.mc AJZT from GJ_AJJBQK a LEFT JOIN aj_jbxx b on a.AJBH=b.AJBH left join (select c.* from dict_ga c LEFT JOIN dict_ga_sm d on c.DICT_SM_ID=d.id where d.ID=5) e on a.AJZT=e.code where 1=1
and a.ajbs=#{ajbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from GJ_AJJBQK where cbrid=#{cbrid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.ajbs,a.glbh,a.ajbh,a.ajlx,a.tqdwmc,a.tqdwdm,a.yssj,a.fssj,a.nm090d5cb6c0dfae21,a.nm5053fd8bd598dd8c,a. nm594ab7c3bdfd644b,a.tqaydm,a.sfcbaj,a.sfrzqa,a.xyrsfwcnr,a.bhrsfwcnr,a.xyrsftwr,a.bhrsftwr,a. slrq,a.sdsj,a.pages,a.msg_id,a.msg_status_jcy,a.msg_status_fy,a.msg_op,a.issh,a.addtime,a. shry,a.shsj,a.area_code,a.gacbr,a.gaysdw,a.area_code_ga,a.ishandadd,a.msg_date,a.settime,a. ajlb,a.badwid,a.badwmc,a.sfrj,a.rjsj,a.newdzjz,a.ysqtay,a.sfzwfzaj,a.sflajdaj,a.sfjdxzjgysaj,a. ysajdxzjglb,a.gtfzxz,a.gtfzrs,a.sfdbaj,a.sfgzaj,a.sfzxhd,a.zxhdmc,a.aqzy,a.fuzhu,a.ysrjdh,a. zxhd,a.ysyj,a.sfswaj,a.sfdwfz,a.sfstaj,a.sfzdzrsgsszwfzaj,a.zwfzajsaly,a.zwfzajsaqtly,a.jrzcrq,a. tqjrlb,a.tqjrfs,a.ztfzxyrxmhzch,a.ztxyrrs,a.tipflag,a.ajmc,a.ah,a.sfys,a.tqxt,a.msg_status_zfw,a. msg_status_ga,a.thsj,a.sasj,a.sffgqy,a.cbrname,a.cbrid,a.sarname,a.farname,a.fasj,a.yqshrid,a. yqshrname,a.sfyq,a.shrid,a.shrname,a.shjg,a.shbz,a.sfbj,a.bjsj,a.jcyysrid,a.jcyysrxm,a.jcyyssj,a. sbqxdm,a.ftfd,a.msg_status_ftfd,a.adduserid,a.del_ajzt,a.deluserid,a.attr1,a.attr2,a.attr3,a. jasj,a.oldajbs,a.ywbh,a.yqrq,e.mc ajzt,GROUP_CONCAT(g.xyrxm) xyrxms,ad.FLDMMC tqay from GJ_AJJBQK a left join (select c.* from dict_ga c LEFT JOIN dict_ga_sm d on c.DICT_SM_ID=d.id where d.ID=5) e on a.AJZT=e.code left join gj_xyrqk g on a.AJBS = g.AJBS LEFT join Aj_dictionary ad on ad.FLDM=a.TQAYDM where 1=1
and a.ajzt=#{ajzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.shrid is null and a.sfbj='0'
and a.ajlx='101'
and a.MSG_OP <> 3 and a.sbqxdm=#{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and b.AJMC like CONCAT('%',#{searchContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and g.xyrxm like CONCAT('%',#{searchContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
GROUP BY a.ajbs ORDER BY a.SASJ DESC
